targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(total) as "Total" FROM finance.transaction tran
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where YEAR(negotiationDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) and cat.name in($category);

SELECT sum(total) as "Total" FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where YEAR(dueDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) and dy.status = "PAID" and cat.name in($category);

SELECT (
  (
  	select sum(total) FROM finance.dividends dy
  	inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
  	inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
  	where YEAR(dy.dueDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) and dy.status = "PAID" and cat.name in($category)
  ) / sum(total)
) * 100 as "Percentual" FROM finance.transaction tran
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where YEAR(negotiationDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) and cat.name in($category)

SELECT
  sum(balance) as "Total"
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category)

SELECT sum(total) as "Total" FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and dy.status = "PAID";

SELECT (
  (
  	select sum(total) FROM finance.dividends dy
  	inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
  	inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
  	where cat.name in($category) and dy.status = "PAID"
  ) / sum(total)
) * 100 as "Percentual" FROM finance.transaction tran
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category)

SELECT 
(SUM(variationTotal) / SUM(balance)) * 100 as "Percentual"
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and  inv.priceDay is not null

SELECT sum(variationTotal) as "Total"
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and inv.priceDay is not null

SELECT (
  (
    select sum(total) from finance.dividends dy
    inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
    inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
    where dy.status = "PAID" and cat.name in($category)
  ) + 
  sum(variationTotal) + 
  (
    select sum(tran.profit) from finance.transaction tran
    inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
    inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
    where cat.name in($category)
  )
) AS "Total"
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where inv.priceDay is not null and inv.balance > 0 and cat.name in($category)

SELECT sum(variationDayTotal) AS "Total"
FROM finance.view_investment
where category ->> "$.name" in($category)

SELECT sum((priceDay - previousClosePrice) * qnt) AS "Total" from finance.view_investment
where priceDay is not null and previousClosePrice is not null and balance > 0 and category ->> "$.name" in($category)

SELECT
  inv.updatedAt AS "time",
  inv.priceDay AS "Preço",
  inv.name
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and inv.balance > 0
ORDER BY inv.updatedAt

SELECT
  inv.updatedAt AS "time",
  inv.variationDay AS "Preço",
  inv.name
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and inv.balance > 0
ORDER BY inv.updatedAt

select
inv.logoUrl as "Logo",
inv.name as "Código",
inv.qnt as "Total de Cotas",
inv.balance as "Total de Aportes",
inv.priceAverage as "Preço Médio",
-- sum(dy.total / 100) as "Dividendos Recebidos",
inv.priceDay as "Cotação Hoje",
sum(inv.balance + inv.variationTotal) as "Saldo Atual",
inv.variationTotal as "Lucro/Prejuízo",
inv.changePercentTotal as "Saldo (%)",
inv.percent as "(%) Da Carteira",
replace(inv.category -> "$.name", '"', '') as "Categoria",
inv.sector as "Seguemento"
from finance.view_investment inv
-- left join finance.dividends dy on dy.investmentId = inv.id
where balance > 0 and category ->> "$.name" in($category)
group by inv.id
order by inv.balance desc

SELECT
inv.name as "Código",
tran.price as "Preço",
sum(tran.qnt) as "Qnt",
case
	when tran.type = "SELL" THEN tran.total - ABS(tran.profit)
  else tran.total
end as "Total",
DATE_FORMAT(tran.negotiationDate, "%d/%m/%y") as "Data"
FROM finance.transaction tran
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
where negotiationDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
group by inv.id, tran.negotiationDate, tran.createdAt
order by tran.negotiationDate, tran.createdAt

SELECT
  dy.updatedAt AS "time",
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Dividendo",
  inv.name as Nome,
  CONCAT('R$ ', FORMAT(sum(dy.total - dy.fees), 2)) as "Valor",
  DATE_FORMAT(dy.dueDate, '%d-%b') as 'Dt Pag'
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where dy.status = "PROVISIONED" and inv.balance > 0 and cat.name in($category)
group by inv.id
ORDER BY dy.updatedAt

SELECT
  dy.updatedAt AS "time",
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Dividendo",
  cat.name as Nome,
  CONCAT('R$ ', FORMAT(sum(dy.total - dy.fees), 2)) as "Valor"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where dy.status = "PAID"
group by inv.categoryId
ORDER BY dy.updatedAt

SELECT sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Mês Atual"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where inv.balance > 0 and dy.dueDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and cat.name in($category)

SELECT sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Mês Anterior"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where dy.status = "PAID" and dy.dueDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH) and dy.dueDate <= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and cat.name in($category)

select sum(inv.qnt * dy.price) from finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.id in (select max(tmp.id) from finance.dividends tmp group by tmp.investmentId) and 
dy.dueDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and 
inv.category ->> "$.name" in($category);

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(even.dateReference, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS "time",
  even.description AS metric,
  even.link,
  inv.name
FROM finance.events even
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = even.investmentId
ORDER BY even.dateReference

select 
inv.name as "Nome",
replace(inv.category -> "$.name", '"', '') as "Categoria",
dy.price as "Ùltimo dividendo", 
((dy.price / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
((dy.price / inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M"
from finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.id in (select max(tmp.id) from finance.dividends tmp group by tmp.investmentId) and inv.balance > 0 and category ->>"$.name" in($category)
group by dy.investmentId;

SELECT
  inv.updatedAt AS "time",
  inv.balance as "Balanço",
  inv.name as Nome,
  CONCAT('R$ ', FORMAT(inv.balance, 2)) as "Valor"
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and inv.balance > 0
ORDER BY inv.updatedAt

SELECT
  inv.updatedAt as time_sec,
  sum(inv.balance) as "Balanço",
  inv.sector as Nome
FROM finance.investment inv
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where cat.name in($category) and inv.balance > 0
group by inv.sector
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1) / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1)/ inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M",
  inv.name as "Nome"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.total > 0 AND inv.category -> "$.id" = 1
group by inv.id
ORDER BY sum(dy.total - dy.fees) asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por ATIVO (FIIS)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1) / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1)/ inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M",
  inv.name as "Nome"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.total > 0 AND inv.category -> "$.id" = 2
group by inv.id
ORDER BY sum(dy.total - dy.fees) asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por ATIVO (AÇÃO)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1) / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1)/ inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M",
  inv.name as "Nome"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.total > 0 AND inv.category -> "$.id" = 6
group by inv.id
ORDER BY sum(dy.total - dy.fees) asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por ATIVO (ETF EX)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1) / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
  (((select d.price from finance.dividends d where d.investmentId = dy.investmentId order by d.dueDate desc limit 1) / inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M",
  inv.name as "Nome"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.total > 0 AND inv.category -> "$.id" = 5
group by inv.id
ORDER BY sum(dy.total - dy.fees) asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por ATIVO (EQUITY)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  DATE_FORMAT(dy.dueDate, "%m/%y") as "Date"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.dueDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) and cat.name in($category)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dy.dueDate, "%m/%y")
order by dy.dueDate asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por MÊS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees ) AS "Dividendo",
  "Total de dividendos recebidos"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
inner join finance.category cat on cat.id = inv.categoryId
where dy.status = "PAID" and cat.name in($category)
ORDER BY dy.createdAt

SELECT
   DATE_FORMAT(t.negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
    (select sum(t2.total) from finance.transaction t2 where t2.negotiationDate <= LAST_DAY(t.negotiationDate)) as "Total Compra"
from finance.transaction t
where t.negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
group by DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by t.negotiationDate asc;

SELECT
   DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
  sum(total) AS "Total Compra"
FROM finance.transaction
where `type` = "BUY" AND negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
GROUP BY  DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by negotiationDate asc

SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
  sum(ABS(qnt) * price) AS "Total Venda"
FROM finance.transaction
where `type` = "SELL" AND negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by negotiationDate asc
